meanings.definition: Materials that absorb liquids or gases.
meanings.sent1: The absorbents quickly soaked up the spilled water.
meanings.sent2: The paper towels are absorbents that help clean up spills.
meanings.sent3: The absorbents in the sponge were working hard to soak up the juice.

meanings.sent5: The absorbents in the soil drank up the rain like a thirsty plant.

meanings.sent2: Sponges are great absorbents for wiping down surfaces.
meanings.sent3: The absorbents in the cloth seemed to have a magical ability to clean up spills.
meanings.sent4: His words were like absorbents, absorbing all the attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The absorbents in the air freshener absorbed the unpleasant odors.
